Sentence: Plaza Garibaldi borders one of Mexico Citys most notorious neighborhoods, Tepito, home to La Union gang police say is behind a spurt in drug-dealing and protection rackets.

Sentence: In August, police arrested the presumed leader of the gang, Roberto Moyado Esparza El Betito.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Since then, the Tepito neighborhood has suffered a wave of violence, including several killings.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Garibaldi, on the edge of the touristy, colonial historic center of Mexico City, is known for seedy strip clubs and dive bars, aside from mariachis.

Sentence: In 2013, U.S. civil rights leader Malcolm Xs grandson, Malcolm Shabazz, was beaten to death near the square after a dispute over a nightclub bill.

Sentence: (Reuters) - A divided Connecticut Supreme Court on Friday threw out the 2002 murder conviction of Michael Skakel, a member of the Kennedy family, and ordered a new trial.
Label: Main

Sentence: The 4-3 decision upheld a lower court judges 2013 ruling that Skakels lawyer did not provide an adequate defense, necessitating a new trial on charges that he killed his neighbor Martha Moxley at her Greenwich home in 1975.
Label: Main

Sentence: Justice Richard Palmer, writing for the majority, said the trial lawyer had failed to present the jury with testimony from a witness who could have provided an alibi for Skakel.
Label: Cause_Specific

Sentence: Palmer said the prosecutors case was far from strong, and the outcome might have been different with the alibi testimony.
Label: Distant_Expectations_Consequences

Sentence: This has been a long road for Michael, and we are grateful to the court for its ruling today, said Hubert Santos, Skakels lawyer in the appeal.

Sentence: Skakel, a cousin of Robert F. Kennedy Jr. and nephew of Ethel Kennedy, the widow of U.S.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: Senator Robert F. Kennedy, was sentenced to 20 years in prison before he was freed on bail when state Superior Court Judge Thomas Bishop ruled that his attorney had failed to provide an effective trial defense.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: In 2016, the Connecticut Supreme Court rejected Bishops conclusion and reinstated Skakels conviction, prompting Santos to ask the court to reconsider its decision.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: Since the 2016 ruling, one justice in the majority retired and was replaced by another justice, who voted in favor of ordering a new trial, thus flipping the courts decision.
Label: Cause_Specific

Sentence: In a dissenting opinion, Justice Carmen Espinosa said Skakels decision to file a motion for reconsideration after a justices retirement amounted to judge shopping.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: A spokesman for the Connecticut chief states attorneys office, which argued against Skakels appeal in court, said the office was reviewing the decision.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: The case drew enormous media attention, both because of the connection to the Kennedys and because the murder took place in Greenwich, one of New York Citys toniest suburbs.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Moxley was found bludgeoned to death with a golf club, later traced to a set owned by Skakels mother, when she and Skakel were both 15 years old.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: The case was unsolved for more than 20 years.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: In 1998, former Los Angeles police detective Mark Fuhrman, known for his role in the O.J.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: Simpson murder case, wrote a book implicating Skakel.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: A grand jury was convened that year, and Skakel was charged in 2000.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: (Reuters) - The man suspected of murdering a prominent Houston doctor, who once treated former U.S. President George H.W.
Label: Main

Label: Main

Sentence: Police were searching for Joseph Pappas, who they say shot and killed cardiologist Mark Hausknecht on July 20 as the doctor rode his bicycle to work in Houstons sprawling Medical Center complex.

Sentence: BERLIN (Reuters) - An Iraqi man suspected of the rape and killing of a 14-year-old German girl is also under investigation for raping an 11-year-old German girl in a refugee shelter in the town of Wiesbaden, prosecutors said on Tuesday.
Label: Main

Sentence: The 20-year-old identified as Ali Bashar is suspected of raping the girl in March and sexually assaulting her again in May with a 14-year-old Afghan, the public prosecutors office in Wiesbaden said.
Label: Main

Sentence: Police arrested the Afghan suspect who originally was known to German authorities as a witness in the murder case of the 14-year-old, Susanna Feldman, the office said.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: An outcry over the rape and murder case led Chancellor Angela Merkels conservatives to call for stricter immigration rules and faster deportation of failed asylum seekers.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Iraqi authorities extradited Bashar to Germany on June 9 after Kurdish security forces took him into custody.
Label: Cause_Specific

Sentence: He had left Germany with relatives early last month.The Iraqi suspect, who arrived in Germany at the height of Europes migrant crisis in 2015, was known to police because he had become violent with officials over his asylum status.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Bashar had previously been suspected in the rape of the 11-year-old girl at the refugee center, although an initial investigation was inconclusive.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: His asylum request was rejected in December 2016.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: Merkels decision to welcome more than 1 million refugees in 2015 boosted support for the anti-immigrant Alternative for Germany party.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: The government has put aside more than 20 billion euros ($23.5 billion) to integrate asylum seekers and tackle the root causes of migration.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Merkel last month coolly rebuffed U.S. President Donald Trumps assertion made in a tweet that migrants were behind a surge in crime in Germany, pointing to statistics that showed crime was down.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: AUSTIN, Texas (Reuters) - Texas executed an inmate on Wednesday dubbed the Lovers Lane killer who was convicted of a 2003 ambush in which he tried to rob a man in a parked car on a remote road in San Antonio and then fatally shot him.
Label: Main

Sentence: Juan Castillo, 37, was put to death by lethal injection at the states death chamber in Huntsville, a prisons official said.
Label: Main

Sentence: It was the 11th execution this year in the United States and the sixth in Texas, which has executed more inmates than any other state since the U.S. Supreme Court reinstated capital punishment in 1976.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: To everyone that has been there for me you know who you are, love yall.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: See yall on the other side.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: Thats it, he was quoted as saying in his final statement by the Texas Department of Criminal Justice.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: Castillo had maintained his innocence, saying he was not at the scene.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: He was convicted of killing aspiring rapper Tommy Garcia, then 19.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: Prosecutors said Garcia was set up by his then girlfriend, who lured him to the remote spot with the promise of sex and drugs but plotted to have him robbed by Castillo and two others.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: After Garcia parked, Castillo, brandishing a pistol, smashed a car window, opened a door and demanded Garcia give him his money and jewelry.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: When Garcia refused and tried to run away, Castillo shot him seven times, prosecutors said.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: Of the four people in the plot, only Castillo was sentenced to death and his lawyers have said there was no physical evidence that linked him to the crime.

Sentence: They also said he was convicted because of tainted testimony that included a jailhouse informant who told a Texas court Castillo confessed to him that he was the triggerman.

Sentence: The informant later recanted and said he lied to help himself, court documents showed.

Sentence: Prosecutors said sources pointed law enforcement to the suspects and that Castillos co-defendants told authorities he was the person who shot Garcia.

Sentence: KUALA LUMPUR (Reuters) - Malaysia will reopen an investigation into the murder of a Mongolian model in 2006, media reported on Thursday quoting the countrys police chief, in a case that could spell more trouble for former premier Najib Razak.
Label: Main

Sentence: Two former police officers, who were serving as members of Najibs personal security detail at the time of the murder, were sentenced to death for the crime.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: Najib, who was defeated in an election last month after nearly a decade in power, has denied knowing the woman, but the question of who ordered the killing has never been answered.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: I can confirm we are reopening investigations, Inspector-General of Police Tan Sri Mohamad Fuzi Harun said, adding that a new police report submitted by the models father on Wednesday was one reason for the fresh probe into the murder case.

Sentence: Altantuya Shaariibuu, 28, was killed and blown up with military grade explosives in a forest near Kuala Lumpur.

Sentence: Her father Setev Shaariibuu on Wednesday met with Malaysias new attorney-general Tommy Thomas and Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad, who defeated the scandal-tainted Najib in a stunning election upset last month.

Sentence: Abdul Razak, who said he had had an affair with Altantuya, was charged with abetment in her murder.

Sentence: He was acquitted in 2008.

Sentence: Asked about the Altantuya case in an interview with Reuters this week, Najib said: Im on record to have sworn in a mosque in the name of Allah that I had nothing to do with the case.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: I still maintain that I only knew she died 4-5 days after the death...that was the first time I heard about her.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: There is no evidence to show I ever knew her.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: Mahathir is seeking to lay multiple charges against Najib for his alleged role in looting billions from state-run fund 1MDB and blames him for widespread corruption in the previous government.

Sentence: Najib has consistently denied any wrongdoing.

Sentence: (Reuters) - A retired police officer, who investigators believe is the Golden State Killer, was charged on Thursday with four more counts of murder in Santa Barbara, California.
Label: Main

Sentence: Joseph DeAngelo, 72, who was once a police officer in the California towns of Exeter and Auburn, was charged last month in Sacramento with eight murders during a crime spree in the 1970s and 80s.
Label: Cause_Specific

Sentence: Over the past 16 days since the Sacramento charges were filed, the Santa Barbara county district attorneys office has been working with the county sheriffs office, gathering evidence and conducting interviews, said Santa Barbara County District Attorney Joyce Dudley.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: As a result of this process, I have decided to file four counts of first degree murder with special circumstances against Joseph James DeAngelo, she told a news conference.
Label: Main

Sentence: Diane Howard, from the Sacramento County Public Defenders Office and who is DeAngelos attorney on the Sacramento charges, was not immediately available for comment.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Each of the four counts carries multiple allegations and each count carries the potential for a sentence of life without possibility of parole or the death sentence, she said.
Label: Distant_Expectations_Consequences

Sentence: DeAngelo, who has two adult children, was arrested on April 24 at his home in a Sacramento suburb.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: He is suspected in a dozen killings as well as 45 rapes and more than 120 burglaries in 10 California counties in a decade-long crime spree considered one of the worst in the states history.
Label: Cause_Specific

Sentence: He is scheduled to appear in court in Sacramento on Monday.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: He has not yet entered a plea to any of the charges against him.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Investigators finally cracked the Sacramento case, which has long haunted victims families and law enforcement, by comparing crime scene DNA to genetic information on commercial genealogy websites that consumers use to explore their ancestry.
Label: Cause_Specific

Sentence: Detectives followed the family trees of close matches, seeking people who might be the killer.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: The process produced a promising lead a week ago, when the DNA of a relative pointed to DeAngelo based on his age and the fact that he lived near where the attacks occurred.
Label: Cause_Specific

Sentence: DeAngelo was identified as a suspect about two months after the case gained renewed attention in the book, Ill Be Gone in the Dark, by journalist Michelle McNamara, who died in 2016 and was married to the actor Patton Oswalt.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: MUNICH (Reuters) - A suspected neo-Nazi gang member on trial for involvement in the murders of 10 people apologized to the families of the victims in a German court on Tuesday, even though she denies taking part in the killings.
Label: Main

Sentence: Prosecutors say Beate Zschaepe was part of the National Socialist Underground (NSU), whose members killed eight Turks, a Greek and a German policewoman over seven years from 2000.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: Judges will give a verdict on July 11, the court said on Tuesday, ending a trial that has taken more than five years to complete.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: I am a compassionate person and was able to see and feel the distress and despair of the families, Zschaepe, 43, said in her closing statement at the regional court in Munich.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: I apologize for the suffering I have caused, she added.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: This was only the second time that Zschaepe has spoken in court after more than 400 days of trial hearings.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: She said she had lacked the physical and mental strength to testify and feared her words would be misinterpreted or twisted.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: Zschaepe has denied taking part in the murders with two men, Uwe Boehnhardt and Uwe Mundlos.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: They killed themselves in 2011 when police discovered the gang by chance.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: But she has, through her lawyer, said she felt morally guilty for not stopping them.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: In her previous testimony in 2015, she denied being a member of the NSU and described feeling horrified and bewildered when Boehnhardt and Mundlos told her about some of the murders.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: She considered informing the police at one point, she said at the time, but the men threatened to commit suicide and she was financially dependent on them.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: On Tuesday she said that she did not know how the victims were chosen and that she had denied reality to some extent for a long time.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: Only once she had turned herself in did she realize the full extent of the crimes, she said.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: She said she no longer followed right-wing ideology, saying of her neo-Nazi beliefs that this chapter is closed.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: Addressing the judges, she said: Please do not judge me for something that I neither wanted nor committed.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: The prosecution has demanded a sentence of life in prison.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Zschaepes lawyers have urged the court to convict her of the lesser charges of arson and robbery.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: I only want one thing now, to find closure so that I can eventually lead a life free of fear, Zschaepe told the court.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: The NSU attacks were the most violent by a guerrilla group in Germany since the end of the far-left Red Army Factions two-decade spree in 1991, in which 34 people are estimated to have been killed.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: DAKAR (Reuters) - Three Congo Republic peacekeepers were given sentences of just three years in jail for murdering civilians and are now already free, Human Rights Watch said on Tuesday, describing the sentences as inadequate and unlikely to discourage future abuse.
Label: Distant_Expectations_Consequences

Sentence: A court in the Congolese capital Brazzaville sentenced each of the soldiers in April for the killings of 11 civilians committed in 2014 while the soldiers were serving in an African Union peacekeeping mission in Central African Republic.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: HRW said it secured a copy of the written judgment only last month.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: The three men are now free, having already served most of their sentences, HRW said in a statement.
Label: Main

Sentence: Although the court found the soldiers guilty of war crimes which can carry the death penalty under Congolese law, its judgment cited unspecified extenuating circumstances.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: The authorities in the Republic of Congo missed an opportunity to provide justice for the murders of civilians and to show that no peacekeeper is above the law, said Lewis Mudge, a senior researcher at HRW.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: Giving the soldiers who committed murder little more than a slap on the wrist sent a damaging message to other peacekeepers that they risk little if they commit such crimes.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: Congos government spokesman did not respond to a request for comment.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: The government of President Denis Sassou Nguesso, one of Africas most secretive with a history of repression at home, has previously rejected claims that it has ignored allegations of human rights abuses against its soldiers.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: Failure to hold peacekeepers accountable for crimes committed on foreign soil is a recurring complaint of rights activists.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: The responsibility to prosecute falls on troop-contributing countries who are often unwilling or unable to press charges against their troops.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: According to HRW, the Congolese peacekeepers killed an unarmed boy and arrested at least 12 other civilians in the Central African town of Boali in March 2014 after a peacekeeper was killed in a firefight with a local militia leader.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: The bodies of the 12 people were found nearby in a mass grave in February 2016.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: The remains of a 7-month-old baby who was also killed were never found, HRW said.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: The Congolese court judgment referred only to 11 of the victims.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: Congo Republics hundreds of peacekeepers in Central African Republic later became part of a U.N. mission.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: They were repatriated last year following multiple allegations of sexual abuse and exploitation.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: (Reuters) - A Florida grand jury formally indicted Nikolas Cruz on Wednesday on 17 counts of premeditated murder in the first degree and 17 counts of attempted murder in the first degree for last months shooting spree at a high school in Parkland, prosecutors said.
Label: Main

Sentence: No date was set for an arraignment, at which Cruz will be allowed to enter a plea, said Constance Simmons, a spokeswoman for the Broward County state attorneys office.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: He faces a maximum sentence of either execution or life in prison without parole if convicted.
Label: Distant_Expectations_Consequences

Sentence: The public defenders office in Broward County has said Cruz was willing to plead guilty if county prosecutors choose not to pursue the death penalty.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: The prosecutors office has said a decision on this has not yet been made, according to Simmons.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: The attack, one of the deadliest at a school in a country where school shootings happen multiple times a year, has reignited a national debate about overhauling gun laws in Florida and beyond.

Sentence: (Reuters) - Los Angeles police named a 28-year-old man on Sunday as the suspect who took hostages and barricaded himself for three hours inside a Trader Joes grocery store in which he fatally shot a woman.
Label: Main

Sentence: Gene Atkins is being held on a $2-million bail on suspicion of murder for Saturdays attacks, said Los Angeles Police Department spokesman Drake Madison.
Label: Main

Sentence: Atkins is likely to appear in court to be formally charged early this coming week, Madison added.

Sentence: Atkins is suspected of repeatedly having shot his grandmother and another woman in a separate part of the city before being chased by police and crashing his car outside the Trader Joes, according to the police account.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: He exchanged gunfire with police and entered the crowded store, police said.
Label: Cause_Specific

Sentence: Some people managed to escape the store by climbing through a window down a rope ladder, according to video footage.

Sentence: The stand-off came to an end after the gunman, who at one point was shot in the arm, talked with police over the phone to negotiate a surrender before emerging.

Sentence: The woman killed at the store was identified as Melyda Corado by relatives, who said she worked there as a manager.

Sentence: Trader Joes called the attack the saddest day in Trader Joes history in a statement on its website, saying the store would remain closed indefinitely.
Label: Distant_Expectations_Consequences

Sentence: Our thoughts are with her family, and our Crew Members and customers who experienced this terrifying and unimaginable ordeal, the statement said.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: Atkins grandmother was left in critical condition in the earlier attack on Saturday, police said.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: There was no update on her condition on Sunday, they said.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: MAPUTO, Jan. 15 (Xinhua) -- Terrorists who attacked the Mocimboa da Praia district in the northern Mozambican province of Cabo Delgado have extended their reach of mob activities to the district of Palma, killing seven people and burning houses.
Label: Main

Sentence: In an interview with Xinhua, Angelina Tayobo of the Environmental Association of Cabo Delgado (AMA), a local non-governmental organization based in that province, said the attack began from Saturday night to Sunday dawn.
Label: Main

Sentence: "They attacked a community from the administrative post of Ulumbe, Palma district and killed seven people and burned down houses," she said.
Label: Main

Sentence: Angelina Tayobo said since last October her organization has been moving from one community to another due to the attacks which first had happened in Mocimboa da Praia and now were extending.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: "At the moment we were working in Lalane, Palma district.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: But now we have to leave again," she said.
Label: Distant_Expectations_Consequences

Sentence: According to her, AMA was not the only organization that has been affected by the terrorist attacks.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: "The recent attack was in an area that is likely to compromise some organizations, because it is an area where Anadarko, an American petroleum company has built resettlement houses due to the field of oil exploration they are working on," said Tayobo.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: She added that at first the mob only killed police officers, but now they attack civilians and rape women or kidnap them, and posted movement flags in communities where they attacked.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: "They use various weapons, sticks, machetes and guns, and they do horrible things, they are violent, we cannot hide it or get around of this," she said.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: The source also revealed that in the same violent incursion on Saturday night, the terrorists entered the house of the head of the post office, but luckily no one was at home.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: "It seems they have a tendency to move out from the areas where the police took control, so the attacks are now unpredictable, it can happen at any place," said the same source.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: On October 5 in 2017, a group of about 30 armed fundamentalists launched simultaneous attacks against three police stations in Mocimboa da Praia, which later was classified by the police as terrorism.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: The Police of the Republic of Mozambique has not yet announced on what happened in the Saturday attack, but information indicates that they have been looking into the situation.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: DAR ES SALAAM, Sept. 23 (Xinhua) -- Tanzanian Prime Minister Kassim Majaliwa said on Sunday police have arrested a number of people who were in relation to a ferry disaster killing over 220 people in Lake Victoria.
Label: Main

Sentence: "Police have arrested a number of people for questioning following the grisly marine accident as investigations continue," said Majaliwa at the national burial of nine victims who were not identified by relatives.
Label: Main

Sentence: About 216 victims have already been identified by relatives and their bodies collected for burial.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: The official made the remarks at Ukara Island where the nine were buried that he will soon announce names of members of an investigation team formed by the government.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: On Friday, Tanzanian President Magufuli announced a four-day mourning period for the victims of the ferry accident.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: According to sources, the ferry, with a capacity of 101 passengers and 25 tonnes of cargo, capsized at around 1 p.m. local time Thursday.
Label: Cause_Specific

Sentence: Magufuli also ordered the arrest of safety inspectors from the country's transport regulator, the Surface and Marine Transport Regulatory Authority.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Preliminary investigations showed that the state-owned ferry was overloaded with more than 200 passengers and was being manned by someone who was not the authorized captain of the vessel.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Isack Kamwelwe, the Minister for Works, Transport and Communication, said 225 bodies were recovered from the fateful ferry between Thursday and Sunday morning.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: "We are still searching for more bodies before we halt the recovery operation later today," said Kamwelwe, adding that the recovery operation will be halted after the ferry was pulled out of the waters from one of Africa's great lakes.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: A team of experts from the Tanzania People's Defence Forces (TPDF) and the police force arrived at Ukara Islet, the scene of the accident, on Saturday night to pull out the ferry using state-of-the-art equipment from TPDF, said Kamwelwe.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: One survivor was rescued on Saturday morning from the ferry that capsized in Lake Victoria on Thursday afternoon.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Kamwelwe identified the survivor as Alphonce Charahani, a ferry engineer who was among the passengers, saying he was in critical condition and doctors are fighting to save his life.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: The last major ferry accident on Lake Victoria occurred in 1996 in the same region, killing at least 500 people.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: LOS ANGELES, Oct. 4 (Xinhua) -- A man living in Los Angeles was sentenced to 221 years to life in state prison for trying to kill six Los Angeles County sheriff's deputies and wounding two of them, authority said Thursday.
Label: Main

Sentence: According to a statement issued by the Los Angeles County District Attorney's Office, 42-year-old Juan Manuel Martinez was found guilty of six counts of attempted murder, five counts of assault on a peace officer with a semiautomatic firearm and one count each of false imprisonment of a hostage, dissuading a witness by threat of force and possession of a firearm by a felon.
Label: Cause_Specific

Sentence: At Thursday's sentencing, a Los Angeles County Superior Court Judge ordered Martinez to spend 221 years to life behind bars, the statement said.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: The incident that Martinez involved occurred on June 23 last year, when he shot and wounded a motorcycle deputy who pulled him over during a DUI checkpoint and wounded another deputy as he fled.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: Martinez opened fire on other deputies before hiding in a converted garage for nearly eight hours.
Label: Cause_Specific

Sentence: This shooting incident forced a SWAT team at bay for nearly eight hours before he was arrested.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: GAZA, Sept. 18 (Xinhua) -- Two Palestinians were killed and more than 30 wounded on Tuesday evening by Israeli troops' gunfire in northern Gaza Strip, close to the border with Israel, medics said.
Label: Main

Sentence: Ashraf al-Qedra, spokesman of the health ministry in Gaza, told reporters that one of the two killed is Mohamed Abu Naji, 34 years old, and the other's identity is still unknown.
Label: Main

Sentence: Al-Qedra said that over 30 Palestinians were injured, including a paramedic and two local photo journalists, adding that they were injured by Israeli soldiers' gunfire in northern Gaza Strip.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: The demonstration at Erez crossing on the border was organized by the high commission of the "Great March of Return" to defy the Israeli blockade.
Label: Cause_Specific

Sentence: Hundreds of Palestinian demonstrators joined the protest on Tuesday, which was called "together for protecting the rights of refugees and breaking the Israeli siege."
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Since March 30, the Palestinians in the Gaza Strip have been going through popular protests against Israel.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Demonstrators protest close to the border between Israel and the Gaza Strip, which has been ruled by Hamas movement since 2007.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: On Monday night, two Palestinian young men were killed and another was injured after a missile fired by an Israeli drone directly hit them when they approached the fence of the border.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Al-Qedra said that since March 30, around 180 Palestinians were killed and over 19,000 injured, more than half of whom were shot by Israeli soldiers' gunfire, including women, children, paramedics and journalists.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Israel accused Islamic Hamas movement of standing behind organizing the protests and rallies to pressure Israel to end around 12 years of a tight blockade imposed on Gaza.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Efforts exerted by Egypt and the United Nations Special envoy Nickolay Mladenov had so far failed to broker a cease-fire agreement between Israel and Hamas-led groups in the Gaza Strip.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: HANOi, June 16 (Xinhua) -- An inter-provincial coach carrying 42 people plunged off a pass in Vietnam's central highlands Kon Tum province on early Saturday, killing thee people and injuring 18 others, the provincial police said.
Label: Main

Sentence: The coach, departing from northern Hai Duong province, plunged off Lo Xo Pass to more than 40 meters below.
Label: Main

Sentence: In March, another inter-provincial coach met with a similar accident on the pass, killing its driver and injuring 19 passengers.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: Between January and May, 7,490 traffic accidents occurred in Vietnam, killing 3,476 people, severely injuring 1,988 people and lightly hurting 3,774 others, said the country's Traffic Police Department.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: CAIRO, June 28 (Xinhua) -- The Egyptian police killed four terrorists of the so-called Hasm group in a shootout during a raid on their hiding place in Upper Egypt's province of Assiut, the Egyptian Interior Ministry said in a statement Thursday.
Label: Main

Sentence: The police said the four were involved in a car bomb attack on March 24 in the northern province of Alexandria that killed two policemen and wounded at least four others.
Label: Cause_Specific

Sentence: A day after the blast, which failed to harm Alexandria security chief, the police announced killing six of Hasm group militants and said they were involved in the terror operation.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: The security forces also arrested two Hasm members during relevant raids, according to Thursday's statement.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: The police refers to Hasm group as the armed wing of the currently outlawed Muslim Brotherhood group of former Islamist President Mohamed Morsi.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Hasm appeared in late 2016 and claimed responsibility for a number of terrorist attacks that killed policemen in the country.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: Terror activities in Egypt have killed hundreds of policemen, soldiers and civilians since the military toppled Morsi in July 2013 in response to mass protests against his one-year rule and his Brotherhood group.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: The Sinai-based branch of the Islamic State (IS) regional terrorist group claimed responsibility for most of the terror operations in Egypt over the past few years.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Meanwhile, the Egyptian forces killed hundreds of terrorists and arrested thousands of suspects during the country's anti-terror war declared by President Abdel-Fattah al-Sisi, the army chief then, following Morsi's ouster.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: NEW DELHI, July 22 (Xinhua) -- Indian security forces Sunday killed three militants in Indian-controlled Kashmir who abducted and murdered a police personnel on Saturday, police said.
Label: Main

Sentence: The militants were killed by a joint team of the Indian Army, para-military Central Reserve Police Force and the state police in a gunfight in Kashmir's Kulgam district, some 70 km from capital Srinagar.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: "The three militants, who had holed up in a locality in Kulgam's Khudwani area, were killed by security forces.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: One of them was involved in the abduction and killing of a police constable Saturday," a police official said.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: The policeman, identified as Salem Ahmed Shah, who had been undergoing police training in Kathua, was kidnapped from his home in Kulgam where he was on leave.
Label: Cause_Specific

Sentence: His body was found hours later, following which the security forces launched a massive operation to track down his perpetrators.
Label: Cause_Specific

Sentence: A month ago, an Indian Army soldier was kidnapped and killed by terrorists in southern Kashmir while he was heading home to celebrate the holy Muslim festival of Eid.

Sentence: VANCOUVER, Sept. 10 (Xinhua) -- Police announced charges here Monday against a refugee from Syria for the murder of a 13-year-old girl more than a year after her body was found in a local park.
Label: Main

Sentence: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)'s Integrated Homicide Investigation Team (IHIT) announced first degree murder charges against 28-year-old Ibrahim Ali, a Syrian refugee who arrived in Canada 17 months ago.
Label: Main

Sentence: Marrisa Shen, the child of Chinese immigrants to Canada, was found murdered on July 18 in Burnaby's Central Park not far from her home.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: Police deemed her death a random act of violence and launched what they called their largest investigation in 15 years.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: Police said new evidence in recent days identified Burnaby resident Ali as the lone, prime suspect.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: They arrested him without incident on Friday, Sept. 7, in Burnaby, a metropolitan center that neighbors the City of Vancouver.
Label: Main

Sentence: IHIT said Ali was not known to police until this investigation.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: "This investigation called upon a great deal of resources and long hours for everyone involved," said Superintendent Donna Richardson, Officer-in-Charge of IHIT in a news release.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: "The successful outcome in this investigation was a result of the diligence, unwavering commitment and relentless pursuit of justice from all of our investigators," she said.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: "The incident had a profound impact on the community," said Chief Superintendent Deanne Burleigh, Officer-in-Charge of Burnaby RMCP.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: "I hope that this arrest helps Marrisa's family and the community in their healing process," she said.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: "I want to thank IHIT, our own members from Burnaby RCMP and all of our other policing partners who worked diligently to ensure that the suspect was brought to justice in this challenging investigation."
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: Police said the massive investigation involved canvassing more than 1,300 residents in the area around Central Park, the location at which Shen's body was found just hours after she was reported missing.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: They conducted more than 600 interviews, reviewed more than 1,000 hours of video footage from 60 locations in the area and eliminated more than 2,000 persons of interest.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: IHIT told reporters on Monday that Ali arrived in Canada 17 months ago as a refugee.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: They said the murder still appears to be a random act of violence, meaning Shen did not know her alleged attacker.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: Ali is now in custody and will make his next appearance in court on Sept. 14.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: "We would like to take this opportunity to thank the public for all of their ongoing support and concern for us in this past year," the Shen family said through the police.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: "We are aware that so many people reached out to the police to provide information and we were so grateful for that."
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: They also thanked the media and the police for their work on the case.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: "We hope that justice will now be served and that Marrisa can finally be at peace in heaven," the statement said.
Label: Distant_Expectations_Consequences

Sentence: ATHENS, Sept. 18 (Xinhua) -- Anti-fascist groups organized a series of events in Athens and other cities of Greece on Tuesday, five years after the killing of 34-year-old musician Pavlos Fyssas by a far-right party supporter.
Label: Main

Sentence: On Sept. 18, 2013, Fyssas, a rapper with an anti-fascist action, was stabbed to death in Piraeus port suburb of Keratsini by George Roupakias, a member of the neo-fascist Golden Dawn (Chryssi Avghi) party.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: Leading the march on Tuesday was the banner of Fyssas' family including Fyssas' mother Magda Fyssa.
Label: Main

Sentence: "You see on their faces that there is no trace of remorse.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: That is what makes you mad," she told local Real FM radio station, referring to her son's murderer and ultra-rightists.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: The march started from the site where the killing took place outside a cafeteria and continued to Golden Dawn's offices, at the center of Piraeus.
Label: Main

Sentence: Police forces had been deployed in the area, fearing clashes between leftists and members of far-right groups.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Minor scuffles occurred with hooded protesters pelting rocks at anti-riot policemen who responded by using tear gas, Greek national news agency AMNA reported.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Fyssas' death was the first politically-motivated crime committed by a Golden Dawn supporter since the party's entrance in parliament for first time in 2012, amid voters' anger and disappointment at the harsh austerity introduced to deal with the financial crisis.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: His murder sparked a judicial investigation that culminated in a criminal trial against the party and dozens of its members, which started in April 2015.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: Since then a series of delays has stalled the procedure, while Golden Dawn has entered the parliament again in the 2015 general elections and today holds 15 seats in the 300-member strong assembly.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: "September 18th is a day of suffering for every democrat, a black page in the modern history of our country.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: The murder of Pavlos Fyssas by the criminal gang of the neo-fascists of Golden Dawn reminded us in the most tragic way where the ideologies of hate are leading," Greek Prime Minister Alexis Tsipras wrote on Twitter.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: CHICAGO, Oct. 5 (Xinhua) -- Chicago police officer Jason Van Dyke was found guilty of second-degree murder in fatally shooting black teenager Laquan McDonald four years ago.
Label: Main

Sentence: Jurors reached the verdict on Friday afternoon for the high-profile trail as Chicago police enhanced their presence in the city, bracing for possible protests and even violence in case of a not guilty outcome.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Learning the verdict, demonstrators erupted in cheers outside the courthouse, chanting, "Justice for Laquan.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: Justice for Laquan."
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: White police officer Jason Van Dyke shot 17-year-old McDonald 16 times in 2014, which triggered racial tension for years in Chicago, the third largest city in the United States.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: McDonald reportedly broke into a truck on the night of Oct. 20, 2014 and Jason Van Dyke was one of police officers dispatched to the scene.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: McDonald carried a knife but walked from police when Van Dyke fired 16 shots into the teenager, the police car's dashcam video showed.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: The jury reached the second-degree murder verdict instead of first-degree, which means they found the officer believed his life was in danger at that time but the belief was unreasonable and his reaction was unjustified.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Jurors told media later that the officer's claim of self-defense did not match video footage and they could not buy it.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: Second-degree murder carries a sentence of 4 to 20 years, said special prosecutor Joseph McMahon, who called the verdict "gratifying" and justice for Laquan McDonald and his family.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: Van Dyke was also found guilty of 16 counts of aggravated battery with a firearm.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: "The end of this trial offers an opportunity for this city to come together," McMahon added.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: However, Van Dyke's lead attorney, Daniel Herbert, said he wasn't surprised by the verdict and vowed an appeal on the judge's refusal to move the trial outside Cook County because of the extensive pretrial publicity.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: He argued that it was "a sad day for law enforcement."
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: Hundreds of people marched along a main avenue in downtown Chicago after the verdict, interrupting traffic.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: But the demonstration remained peaceful so far.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: QENA, Egypt, July 28 (Xinhua) -- "Vendetta is better than shame" is a common saying in Upper Egypt, the tribal southern part of the country, which indicates how Upper Egyptian families think of the chronic tradition of blood feuds as "an honor."
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: The phenomenon has been prevailing in the tribal side of southern Egypt for decades or even generations, where family revenge killing equals honor, dignity and manhood, although most of the causes that triggered the enmity are often trivial, such as a quarrel about fighting kids, or a dispute over a phone recharge card.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: The norm in Upper Egypt is that when a family member is killed, the family buries the body but never holds a funeral until they kill the murderer or one of his dearest family members in revenge, and the blood feuds go on.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: In Upper Egypt's Qena province, Nag Ma'alla of Hugairat village is referred to as "the village of widows" for there is almost no home without a widow who has lost her husband in a blood feud or without bullet holes or traces in the walls.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Most of the village men involved in blood feuds live in the nearby mountains to escape either murder or arrest.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Widows usually dress only in black for long years as a sign of mourning and they breastfeed their babies the desire for blood revenge, said Fathiya al-Essaily, a 70-year-old woman from "the village of widows," who lost both her husband and elder son in vendetta feuds.
Label: Distant_Anecdotal

Sentence: "A widow here would push her son for killing in revenge regardless of the consequences and the possible murder or escape of her son, because only then she would be no longer living in shame," the old lady told Xinhua at her one-storey home in Nag Ma'alla of Hugairat village in Qena.
Label: Distant_Anecdotal

Sentence: 62-year-old Mohamed Owais, also from Nag Ma'alla, lost both his brother and his 15-year-old nephew in a similar feud that represented "the most difficult moments" in his life.
Label: Distant_Anecdotal

Sentence: "When my brother saw his boy smeared with blood and breathing his last, he lost consciousness and died and we buried them both together," Owais said while sitting outside his two-floor raw-brick house.
Label: Distant_Anecdotal

Sentence: The blood feud, Owais continued, went on for several years until the Owais family accepted a reconciliation brokered by security authorities and popular reconciliation committees one and a half years ago.
Label: Distant_Anecdotal

Sentence: The tradition of reconciliation in a blood feud is a kind of ceremony watched by all villagers, where the one whose turn is to be killed walks to the family whose turn is to take revenge carrying his death shroud, a white garment, in his arms.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: He submissively and apologetically lies down in front of the man who is supposed to kill him as a sign of seeking forgiveness.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: His apology is always accepted because it is considered in Upper Egypt as shame for him and honor for the other family.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Lawmaker Hamza Abu Sehli from Qena, who lost his elder son in a blood feud with a big family, said that the recently reached reconciliation put an end to a wave of bloodshed between the two families and restored his inner peace.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: "I convinced my family to accept the reconciliation urged by official and popular efforts to stop the killing circle between the two families, and my reconciliatory attitude was respected by everyone," the parliamentarian told Xinhua in the Upper Egyptian province.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: Mahmoud Abdel-Mo'ez, a 65-year-old retired employee at the Ministry of Education, recalled the tragedy of losing his son during his wedding ceremony due to a vendetta feud and losing his wife who died out of grief over her son's death a few months later.
Label: Distant_Anecdotal

Sentence: An elementary school student in Hugairat village, whose parents conditioned not to mention his name, lamented that most teachers are reluctant to show up at school due to the many surrounding feuds, noting that most students drop education at some stage.
Label: Distant_Anecdotal

Sentence: "A lot of boys here learn how to carry guns since childhood," the boy continued with a sad tone.
Label: Distant_Anecdotal

Sentence: "I hope that we all carry pens rather than guns for the best interest of our village and nation."
Label: Distant_Anecdotal

Sentence: Despite the cancerous tradition, the authorities, in cooperation with wise people through special committees, managed to achieve dozens of reconciliations and end bloodshed between big families over the past few years.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: "The security department in Qena, in cooperation with the governorate and the reconciliation committees, managed to achieve 100 reconciliations between feuding families in the past four years," said Qena's Deputy Security Chief Alaa al-Ayyat.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: In the last two years, the police also seized more than 3,000 unlicensed guns with over 20,000 bullets in Qena province, which is known as "the capital of Upper Egypt's tribes."
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: For his part, Governor of Qena Abdel-Hamid al-Haggan said that the political leadership puts the elimination of blood feuds as one of its priorities in Upper Egypt, particularly in Qena.
Label: Main

Sentence: He stressed that such disputes negatively affect the nation's struggle for progress and development.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: "The good traits and values of Upper Egyptians, including forgiveness, contributed to the rising number of reconciliations that reflects a positive change in Upper Egyptian cultures and thoughts," the governor told Xinhua.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: RIO DE JANEIRO, Aug. 25 (Xinhua) -- Brazil detained over 2,600 adults and around 340 minors in operations carried out against homicide and social violence in various states, said the police on Saturday.
Label: Main

Sentence: During the two-day "Cronos" operation, nearly 450 people were detained because of homicide and femicide, 1,252 for various crimes and 640 for drug trafficking or illegal possession of firearms.
Label: Main

Sentence: State-run media Agencia Brasil reported that about 7,800 police officers, coordinated by the Ministry of Public Security, took part in the operation, which also found 383 kg of drugs, including marijuana and cocaine.
Label: Main

Sentence: "The most important is the protection and guarantee of life, especially combating femicide.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: This cowardly crime is unacceptable," Public Security Minister Raul Jungmann said.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: According to data released by the Brazilian Public Security Yearbook 2018 earlier this month, the South American country has broken its own record for the number of murders in 2017, with homicide cases rising around 3 percent from 2016 to 63,880.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: BEIJING (Reuters) - A former mining magnate with suspected ties to the family of Chinas retired security tsar Zhou Yongkang was sentenced to death on Friday on charges of leading a gang on a crime spree spanning two decades.
Label: Main

Sentence: The sentencing of Liu Han, handed down by a court in the central province of Hubei, was the culmination of one of the highest-profile cases against a private businessman since President Xi Jinping took office last year and began a campaign against pervasive graft.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Lius younger brother Liu Yong, also known as Liu Wei, was also sentenced to death.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Microblog statements from state media outlets China Central Television and the Xinhua news agency said the brothers, along with their 36-member mafia-style gang, committed intentional homicide.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: Xis crackdown has zeroed in on Sichuan province, where Lius company - privately held Hanlong Mining - is based.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Sichuan was a power base for Zhou, the retired chief of Chinas vast domestic security apparatus, who stands at the centre of the biggest corruption scandal in more than six decades, sources have told Reuters.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: Sources have told Reuters that Liu was once a business associate of Zhou Bin, Zhou Yongkangs eldest son.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: State media have not explicitly linked Lius case to Zhou Yongkang, but have said Lius rise coincided with Zhous time as Sichuans Communist Party boss.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: Lius lawyer could not be immediately reached for comment.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Willy Lam, a scholar of Chinese history and politics at the Chinese University of Hong Kong, said there would be extra attention paid to the case because of Lius links to the Zhou family.
Label: Distant_Expectations_Consequences

Sentence: I think whats happening is that Xi Jinping and (Party anti-corruption tsar) Wang Qishan want to establish a harsh precedent because this is one of the biggest corruption cases since Xi took over, Lam said.
Label: Distant_Expectations_Consequences

Sentence: They want to set a precedent to make people afraid, in a sense, to have a deterrence impact on corrupt officials.
Label: Distant_Expectations_Consequences

Sentence: Prosecutors in Hubei said Liu Han and his younger brother formed the gang in 1993.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: It carried out a vast number of criminal activities, including the murders of nine people, they said.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: Other members of the gang received sentences ranging from 11 years in prison to death, Xinhua said.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: State media reported that Liu, who was arrested last year, faced charges ranging from murder to gun-running and extortion for crimes carried out in Sichuan.
Label: Cause_Specific

Sentence: He denied leading a gang, and media reports said he denied killing anyone or holding or trading guns illegally.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: Hanlong had attempted to take over Australias Sundance Resources Ltd, an exporter of iron ore focused on West Africa.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: The deal was scrapped a year ago after Hanlong missed funding deadlines.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: Liu founded Hanlong Group, a conglomerate with interests in sectors from solar energy to real estate and infrastructure, in 1997.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: GAZA, Nov. 12 (Xinhua) -- Thousands of Palestinian mourners and militants buried on Monday seven Palestinian militants in southern Gaza Strip town of Khan Younis amid calls of "painful revenge from Israel."
Label: Main

Sentence: Mourners and masked militants wearing masks and holding guns carried the bodies of the seven militants from the hospital in the city of Khan Younis in southern Gaza Strip and went to their homes for a goodbye look.
Label: Main

Sentence: The bodies of the militants belong to six members of al-Qassam Brigades, Hamas armed wing and one member of Salahidin Brigades, the armed wing of the pro-Hamas Popular Resistance Committees.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: The mourners and the militants carried the bodies of the seven militants wrapped with green Hamas flags and took them from their homes and went to the mosque for the last prayers before taking them to the graveyard for burial.
Label: Main

Sentence: Miles and miles of bigger and stronger levees have been built along the Missouri and Mississippi Rivers since the deadly floods of 1993, and millions of dollars have been spent on drainage improvements.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Yet as the rush of water that caused the Missouri River to overflow its banks and submerge dozens of towns last week rolled toward St. Louis on Monday, attention was turned to a metropolitan region that since 1993 has seen runaway residential and commercial development in the rivers' flood paths.
Label: Main

Sentence: About 28,000 homes have been built and more than 6,000 acres of commercial and industrial space developed on land that was underwater in 1993, according to research by Nicholas Pinter, a geologist who studies the region at Southern Illinois University in Carbondale.

Sentence: Building is happening on flood plains across Missouri, but most of the development is in the St. Louis area, and it is estimated to be worth more than $2.2 billion.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Though scientists warn about the danger of such building, the Missouri government has subsidized some of it through tax financing for builders.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: ''No one has really looked at the cumulative effect,'' said Timothy M. Kusky, a professor of natural sciences at St. Louis University, who calculates that there has been more development on the Missouri River flood plain in the years since 1993 than at any other time in the history of the region.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: The good news for St. Louis right now is that forecasters say the two rivers will crest well below their 1993 levels by Tuesday, sparing the area significant flooding.

Sentence: But many scientists remain concerned that the effect of the new construction, should a levee break, could eventually be even more severe flooding.

Sentence: Levees constrict a river's path and raise its water level, which causes higher, faster flow.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: A flood plain, conversely, exists in nature to absorb a river's overflow.
Label: Distant_Evaluation

Sentence: ''The more levees we build, the higher we have to build them,'' Professor Kusky said.

Sentence: ''It's a self-perpetuating problem.''

Sentence: Still, people have been drawn to the area, assured by the sense of security the levees provide.

Sentence: Disincentives beyond the possibility of flooding seem to be few.

Sentence: ''This was absolutely a dodged bullet,'' Professor Pinter said.

Sentence: ''This could have been a very bad situation for St. Louis, but luckily it was a near-miss.''

Sentence: People living in the flood plains are eligible for the National Flood Insurance Program or for any private insurance they can secure, though the private alternatives are increasingly difficult to obtain.

Sentence: State and local governments in Gulf Coast areas devastated by the 2005 hurricanes will no longer be required to pay 10 percent of the cost of repairing their roads, schools and other public works, under a provision of the emergency war spending bill approved by Congress on Thursday night.

Sentence: BADDAGANA, Sri Lanka (Thomson Reuters Foundation) - On the surface, Sri Lankas capital Colombo looks like any other fast-growing South Asian city, with buildings stretching as far as the eye can see and skyscrapers rearing up along its coast.

Sentence: (Reuters) - When Hurricane Michael barreled into the Florida Panhandle on Wednesday with 155-mph (249-kph) sustained winds, it defied forecasts made just two days beforehand, its wind speeds doubling since Monday and coming in just short of the highest category of intensity.
Label: Main

Sentence: Michael was not the only tropical cyclone in recent years to undergo what scientists refer to as rapid intensification, defined as an acceleration of wind speeds of at least 35 mph (56 kph) in 24 hours or less.
Label: Main

Sentence: The phenomenon has become more serious as sea waters have warmed with climate change.
Label: Cause_Specific

Sentence: It is most likely that the very warm water in the Gulf ... is likely contributing to the intensity and the intensification that we have seen, said Jim Kossin, an atmospheric scientist with the U.S. National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration.
Label: Cause_Specific

Sentence: Rapid intensification is dangerous because it gives businesses, industry and people on the ground less time to take appropriate precautions ahead of hurricanes like Michael that hit shore with far more furious winds than originally expected.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Several factors can contribute, but warmer waters increase the potential for a storm becoming stronger, climate scientists have said.
Label: Cause_Specific

Sentence: Climate change means that warmer ocean temperatures are being seen more often, said Jennie Evans, a professor of Meteorology at Pennsylvania State University.
Label: Cause_Specific

Sentence: Since weve got warm temperatures in the Gulf now, a hurricane has a much better chance to reach its maximum possible intensity, which appears to be what Michael is doing, she said.
Label: Cause_Specific

Sentence: In some cases, high-altitude winds can put a cap on a storms ability to draw power from moist sea air.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: But in Michaels case, that brake was not in place.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Rapid intensification happens about 5 percent of the time and is difficult to predict.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Last year, in the Atlantic basin, forecasters correctly forecast six of 39 such instances, according to Michael Brennan, branch chief of the hurricane specialist unit at the U.S. National Hurricane Center.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: The NHC said last year it failed to adequately predict the rapid intensification of Hurricane Matthew in 2016 to a Category 5 storm with maximum sustained winds of 165 mph (270 kph).

Sentence: Matthew was directly responsible for 585 deaths, including more than 500 people in Haiti, the NHC said.
Label: Distant_Historical

Sentence: While the science of tracking a storm relies heavily on data about conditions on its periphery, predicting intensity relies on measuring what is happening in the middle of it.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Typically, that means flying a hurricane hunter aircraft inside the storm, recording wind speeds from a weather buoy as a storm passes overhead or relying on satellites that may fly over once every other day.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: Collecting consistent data through the storm is difficult and limits the ability to predict intensity, hurricane experts have said.
Label: Cause_General

Sentence: In recent storms that have intensified quickly, the phenomenon has been more exaggerated than in the past, according to a recent research paper co-authored by Pacific Northwest National Laboratory researcher Karthik Balaguru.
